constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 209 (Friday, December 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ARRINGTON:
H.R. 6139.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H6915]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Responsible Budgeting Act
